content: written crochet pdf pattern in english us terminology no charts the crochet skill level is intermediate the pattern consists of 18 rounds for this project you need yarnart violet cotton thread 50 g / 1 76 oz / 308 yards / 282 m per skein 25 g / 0 88 oz / 154 yards / 141 m 2 mm hook finished size 8 / 20 cm if you have any questions feel free to contact me
